biotools.summary: rCASC, Cluster Analysis of Single Cells, is part of the reproducible-bioinformatics.org project and provides single cell analysis functionalities within the reproducible rules described by Sandve et al. [PLoS Comp Biol. 2013]. rCASC is designed to provide a complete workflow for cell-subpopulation discovery.
